marklogic.body: Oh please I'll dump his *** right on the Spot. I know he's your husband and SAYING he want it to work(if he actually do)but still he cheated on you. Once a cheater Always a cheater. I know I don't know him like you do but from what I read he is just aÂ piece of sh*t and pretending like he want it to work so you won't take haft his money and spit everything equally(It is not all about that) but still. I know this was 8 months ago but i'ts never too late to try to help someone.."Better late then never"
